title: Chuck Norris on Mars
body: Chuck Norris has already been to Mars; that's why there are no signs of life.

title: Chuck Norris and the Death
body: Chuck Norris died 20 years ago, Death just hasn't built up the courage to tell him yet.

title: Chuck Norris in Africa
body: When Chuck Norris visits Africa, the animals are required to stay in their cars.

title: Chuck Norris on toilet
body: Chuck Norris doesn't flush the toilet, he scares the shit out of it.

title: Chuck Norris' invention
body: When Alexander Bell invented the telephone he had 3 missed calls from Chuck Norris.

title: Chuck Norris' Poker Face
body: Chuck Norris' hand is the only hand that can beat a Royal Flush.

title: Chuck Norris and corners
body: Chuck Norris can sit in the corner of a circular room.

title: Chuck Norris cleaning a pool
body: Chuck Norris can empty a swimming pool with a fork... while it's raining.

title: Chuck Norris and the Earth
body: Chuck Norris once kicked the Earth, it hasn't stopped spinning.

title: Chuck Norris and the Jedi
body: A Jedi said: Let the Force be with you, Chuck replied: I am the Force
